archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.4.6: Intrusion detection methods should be supported by specialist software, such as Host-based Intrusion Detection Systems (HIDS) (e.g. Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR), client or host-based IPS agent) and Network-based Intrusion Detection Systems (NIDS), or an equivalent cloud service provider (CSP) service.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
